options.name: report
options.description: Top Level for reports

options.name: one
options.description: Displays a list of users with a high auction sell percentage

options.name: two
options.description: Displays a list of auctions selling for a certain amount over eval

options.name: three
options.description: Displays where a user sells a card on auction, and re-purchases that same card

options.name: four
options.description: Same as report 3, but the person has to be the same person the auction went to

options.name: five
options.description: Displays when a user purchases a card via direct sale or auction and sells the card to bot

options.description: Set to true to further filter by only gets
